mapper.select: SELECT id, name, price, overview, thumbs_image_name, created_at, updated_at FROM item ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, price, overview, thumbs_image_name, created_at, updated_at FROM item WHERE id BETWEEN #{min} AND #{max}
SELECT i.id, i.name, i.price, i.overview, i.thumbs_image_name, i.created_at, i.updated_at FROM item i JOIN item_category c ON i.id = c.item_id WHERE c.category = #{category} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, price, overview, thumbs_image_name, created_at, updated_at FROM item WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT i.id, i.name, i.price, i.overview, i.thumbs_image_name, i.created_at, i.updated_at FROM item i LEFT JOIN item_category c ON i.id = c.item_id WHERE i.name ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR i.overview ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.category ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY i.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (id, name, price, overview, thumbs_image_name, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{price}, #{overview}, #{thumbsImageName}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, overview = #{overview}, thumbs_image_name = #{thumbsImageName}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
